name: Just a dream...
description:
Lucas just waked up in the middle of the night.

Something is moving in his bedroom.

Is one of his Teddy Bears alive ?

Check the room with the torch light and find the demonic Teddy before it rushes on the poor Lucas.

Survive until sunrise to win. Each time you find the demonic Teddy, the clock jumps one hour later. At 7.00 you will be safe.

Use the mouse to move the light, click on the Teddy you suspect to be demonic. But don't miss, He will not.

update 04212015-1 : selection bad teddy small bug fixed : thanks The4thCircle
